title: Lamar and Tandy: Nashville Season 2 Predictions
description:
For all of Nashville season one, Lamar and Tandy we as thick as thieves -- then it all fell apart in the finale. What does it mean for season two? Our Nashville experts debate. 

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Nashville's first season is in the books, but Greg and Kristine aren't ready to be done with the hit ABC drama. Join them as they predict just what's going to happen when Nashville returns for season two!

All of Greg and Kristine's predictions: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVsBA7Hn32dkMqYOcKYqw0jV

Catch all of Nashville on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/tv-season/nashville-season-1/id550311456

Nashville music on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/artist/nashville-cast/id576010239

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy
Follow Kristine on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/steimer
